title: Lovely food and fast service
text: Have eaten here before and loved it. The atmosphere is friendly as are the staff. The food is well prepared and flavoured and arrives quickly from the kitchen. Very busy when we ate lunch there. Thanks

title: Nice surrounds but basic mistakes by staff
text: Went here for lunch with my wife and mum for her birthday. The staff were very pleasant and helpful but several things let them down. They offered coconut milk when they didn’t have any, they forgot the side order and put bacon on one dish when it was asked to be swapped. Possibly could have been avoided if the waitress had used a pad instead of her memory.

title: Food and service food, liquors and spirits not so.
text: Had a large group booking and everyone enjoyed the food but the bar service was not so. The waitress came over with three beers and didn’t know which one was which. Had to taste test them all to find out. The bar tender said it wasn’t their problem and we had to sort it out. The spirits and port were very average as well. Let down but the bar staff.

title: Always good for brunch
text: Have visited this cafe several times with great results. Very good for brunch and lunch with covered outdoor seating. Food lovely and child friendly.

title: Worth a stop of you’re hungry
text: Not many options between Rotorua and Whakatane to stop and eat but this one was worth it. Be careful as they have a distinct breakfast and lunch time menu. The food however was well portioned and very tasty. Fish had been freshly caught that day. Thanks

title: Better places for coffee
text: Went here to get some coffees for work colleagues. Coffee is ok and was very busy. I’d put it as an average coffee and food place like Starbucks. There are better places to get your coffee fix.

title: Don’t go by the bame
text: Were in Akaroa for the day to relax and decided on lunch here. Has had to change its name but has always been a great place to get a feed, especially fish. The food was very good as always and the staff pleasant. Has lots of room for large groups as well. Worth a stop.

title: Lovely cafe and staff
text: Have been here several times and the food, atmosphere and staff have been very good. Tucked away opposite the Mediterranean Store we have always enjoyed the food and staff service. Thanks

title: Some of the best Indian food in Christchurch
text: If money allows this would be my first pick for Indian food in Christchurch. We have had take away and dine in and the food has been excellent each time. Lovely intimate setting in the restaurant. Would recommend.

title: Very good food
text: Have been several times for dine in food and never disappointed. Great vegan and vegetarian food, ingredient take always and very friendly staff. Never seen it busy. They also do vegan sausages etc to take away. Would recommend.

title: Too noisy
text: Was recommended this place and went on a Sunday lunch time. Was probably why it was so busy and too noisy to be able to talk with my group. The food was very good but I’d highly recommend going outside the lunchtimes.

title: Great restaurant
text: Came here with friends as they had been before. The food and service was very good but the place closed very early on a Saturday night. Had plenty of warning they were closing but felt a bit short changed. Did book at 7.00 but expected to be able to be there later.

title: Nice easy pub food
text: Very busy on a week night but we had just co e out if lock down. Food was good as it always is at any of their branches. Very busy and had to wait for 10 minutes for a table and quite noisy as well. Service was very good and food great. Thanks

title: Great beer tasters
text: A friend was very keen to come here as he was a fan of the beer. Food was good but the selection of beers and tasters was the star. Lovely industrial area so have a walk before or afterwards and check out some of the other businesses here.

title: Always good Italian food
text: Favourite place to go and eat. Had a large family event and ordered in line. Staff very friendly and the food was ready to pick up on time. Food was very good as always. Would recommend this place. Thanks.

title: Worth a stop
text: Always stop here for a pie or some other bakery goods. Great selection of both meat and vegetarian options. Quite busy during the day which shows how good the food is. Well done.

title: Highly recommended
text: We visit regularly, especially if we are out and visiting the Littleton market. Suggest going early in the day as it fills up quickly. Food is always very good with plenty of options. Well done.

title: Excellent as always
text: Very lovely food, excellent as always. Haven’t eaten in and always had it as a takeaway. No complaints about any of the food options. Thanks

title: Don’t order the gluten free base
text: Normally very good pizzas and service but was very disappointed with the gluten free pizza and the responses. My wife ordered the vegetarian gluten free base and got a pizza with literally four small pieces of vegetables on it. When we complained she was told that’s how it comes and we had to pay for it. Very disappointed. Will look elsewhere for pizzas if this price.

title: Fun and challenging
text: Have been here before but took the family with some primary school aged children. Very entertaining and fun way to spend a dreary day. Would have to book in advance as at present they have less spaces due to Covid but this is likely to change soon. Thanks.

title: Was looking for a local place
text: Was looking for a local place to get take away and went here. Got the pizza and flat bread. Very accomodating got a sauce change and the food was very good. Always a winner here.

title: Mother’s day treat
text: A regular for drinks on a Friday when it can get busy. Ordered early for some pizza on Mother’s Day during lockdown. Lovely food as normal, you get what you pay for. Local business owned by a local business man, not a corporate giant. Staff were very friendly. Thanks.

title: Lovely take away
text: Friendly staff and good food. A nice way to support the local community. They were happy to oblige with our order. Just as described and easy to get to with plenty of parking. Thanks.

title: Lovely quaint but modern
text: Very cool indoor market but linked to outdoor shops as well. Groceries are expensive but aimed at the tourist market. The food in all the stalls was excellent and served with friendly staff. On a good day order take away and sit by the river. Heaps to choose from.

title: Modern efficient stadium
text:
ELTON John concert was brilliant and the sound quality was great. The seating apart from right behind the stage had good views of the entire stage. Comfortable seating, entry was easy with no bags and efficient. The ability to get to and away from the venue had obviously been practiced many times and went smoothly.
Prices for food etc would be what you would expect.

title: Excellent food
text: This is a great place to have excellent food at reasonable prices. Even a meat eater would not miss this vegetarian inspired menu. Each dish was well presented with clearly tasty ingredients. They have done well. Thanks

title: Wow, this is an excellent place to eat
text: Wow, this is an excellent place to eat. The food was brilliantly done, the staff friendly and the atmosphere was superb. It was a 43 degree day but the food took our mind off it. Lots of choices and the drinks were excellent. Well done.

title: Just what we needed
text: This was close to the airport for our late flight. Rooms are what you’d expect for a budget hotel. Very pleasantly surprised at how quiet it was, especially with the planes flying overhead. Paid carpark on site, the bathrooms were clean and functionable. Very friendly helpful staff. Thanks

title: Very nice food for a chain restaurant
text: Very nice food for a chain restaurant. Service was friendly and food came out quickly. It’s was well proportioned and filled us up nicely. Thanks

title: Nice wee hotel
text:
Nice wee hotel close to Cronulla and reasonably close to Sydney. Off street car parking and balcony rooms. Was reasonably priced during the busy season. Rooms were serviced daily and were clean and tidy. Each had at least a bar fridge and microwave as well as tv etc.
Only comment would be to allow same towels to be used for multiple nights. It’s something little that will make a difference to the environment. Thanks

title: A regular meal
text: A regular for when I feel like something more than a stodgy fried mass produced meal. All the food is prepared once ordered. Ingredients are fresh and I look out for the same company wherever I travel. Smoothies and salads are very good. Thanks

title: Great food and very quick service
text: Great food and very quick service as usual. One of our favourite places to eat. There are so many options that anyone would get a good meal here. Always busy but this doesn’t distract from the service. Thanks again.

title: This is always an excellent place to eat
text: This is always an excellent place to eat. Have been here many times with family and friends. They cater for vegetarians and meat eaters alike. We have never left disappointed. Thanks again

title: New restaurant in a refurbished
text: New restaurant in a refurbished Mitte 10 mega store. Obviously a Hugh step up from the old cafe here. Plenty of seating with a good atmosphere. Good food selection and they were well made and cooked. Service was reasonable.

title: Ok for pub food
text: Ok for pub food and much better than the other options in the area. Limited choices for vegetarians but standard food for others. Deserts were much better than the mains and the highlight of the evening.

title: Large pleasant place
text: The lounge is a pleasant place to relax, plenty of food, drink, showers etc. if you want a shower you’ll need to book. Beats the remainder of the airport but only just. Have to leave the lounge to do the duty free shipping. Plenty of paid food options in the general areas.

title: Hamilton spectacular
text: Came especially to see Hamilton. Wonderful experience with a great cast (the cast is about to change in November). The theatre, like so many in London is a treat. Well worth it. Well done.

title: Loved it
text:
This is right up my alley. Beautifully recreated museum and war rooms to how they were during the war. A large tribute to Winston Churchill who did a lot more in his life than just WW2. Would definitely go again.
Went on a Thursday and could go at my own pace. I can see it getting cramped during the holidays so I would avoid those times.

title: Great place for a wander
text: This is a great place for a wander. We arrived about 9.30 and pretty much everything didn’t open till 10 (Thursday). After 10am everything comes to life. Apparently the buskers must be at a certain standard or they can’t perform. The classical singer certainly fitted the bill.

title: Clean and Efficient
text: Runs on time even in busy periods. Clean through out the trains and inside the stations. One of the better services I’ve experienced.

title: Very good
text:
I have read some reviews that are recent and have been quite negative. The common theme has been rude staff.
We can’t complain about the atmosphere, food or staff as all were very good. It was the only place serving breakfast at that time and can’t fault any of it.
Will look out the other restaurants if this is the standard. Thanks.

title: Well stocked plenty of options.
text: Well stocked market with plenty of options. All inside so it doesn’t matter about the weather. Friendly staff and lots of produce to browse through before choosing. Lots of organic and vegetarian friendly options as well as run of the mill options. Fruit, veges, meat, cheese and house hold items. Well worth a visit.
place: Secretts Farm Shop and Pick Your Own

title: Busy but lovely food
text: Food was very nice with plenty of options. Prices were mid range but one dish each was enough to fill us up. No seating inside but plenty outside. Grab a table, look at the menu and then order at the counter. Friendly helpful staff.

title: Running out of food options?
text:
Booked here for a gathering of friends and family. The staff were pleasant enough, although a bit confused at times. Food was nice but at least 10 menu items were not available as they had run out. They have just reopened and obviously some teething issues. Luckily there were other food options.
Very noisy, and would have been a nice atmosphere without that. Prices were on the moderate to expensive side. Parking was free if you dined in or pay and display if you used the carpark and went elsewhere.

title: Excellent food and wait staff
text: We visited three bars that were full before we found this place. Parking around the corner which is free on Sundays and public holidays. The food was excellent and the wait staff were entertaining, informative and engaging. Well done to all and highly recommended. Thanks

title: Steeped in History
text: An ancient site that is free to visit. Even though it’s free there are still information boards and the grounds seem well kept. Interesting site, well worth the trip.

title: History
text: Nice place to get some history but to get in you need to pay. Check the times that it is open but you can walk through the gardens and around the outside for free. Not a wet day activity.

title: Reasonable food at reasonable prices
text: Good food and lots of options at the buffet. Friendly helpful staff. Prices were on the higher side. Overall very good.

title: Good accomodation
text: Quite pricey but clean and tidy place. Good food in the restaurant and what you’d expect from this type of establishment. Close to hospital and university and about 30 min walk to Guildford. Friendly staff.

title: Typical English pub
text: Very friendly locals and a great place on a wry day. Very nice four and reasonable prices. Typical English pub

title: Very nice pizza
text: Very good mid price option for pizza. No Pizza Hut in the area any more. Take away or eat in, which is not an option for other restaurants. Good service

title: Very nice food, lots of options
text: Lots of options and the resulting food was delicious. Very quiet for a Saturday, the place was empty. Fast service as a result.

title: Must see
text: Well worth the trip. Didn’t do a guided trip or audio but just listened to the guides as they passed by. Easy to walk around and lots of info boards to read. Well organised in conflicts. Have to see it on your trip.

title: Popular place
text: Nice place with good food. Atmosphere was cool with a lot of people present. Plenty of tv’s to watch numerous sports games on.

title: Nice food in nice surroundings
text: It’s nice to have a place where you get some good food choices. Went with this place and was very happy with the food and service. Nicely done, thanks

title: Lovely authentic food
text: Love Asian food and this didn’t disappoint. Real flavours and well presented. Plenty of vegetarian options and seafood. Very friendly staff who were efficient even in s very busy restaurant. Well done. Thanks

title: Great place on a wet night.
text: Was looking for vegetarian options and saw this place. The atmosphere and staff were very good. The food was well done and presented, the chilli prawns were my favourite. Looked like the staff were having fun as well which flowed onto us. Thanks

title: Vegan takeaway
text: Seen some very precious reviews and for a place trying to do some good it’s disappointing. Hopefully there will be more reviews posted to give a balanced view. It is what it is. When you make Aioli with vegan ingredients it won’t taste exactly the same as egg based. Take it for what it is. We enjoyed it and if you open your mind you will too. Thanks

title: Very cool
text: Issac was excellent as a host. Very interesting displays and background information. Questions answered quickly and expertly and very friendly. Was very patient with the smaller girls questions. Great thing to do on a wet day and with family.

title: Have ordered from here several times
text: Have ordered here several times and had no problem with the service or drinks. Stick standard food that you can get from other chains. Tasty enough to encourage me to keep going back when I’m in the area.
